channel.title: Wrong item place
channel.description: ok when ever i put on a heraldic sheild on project16 and dragon hide gilded, it all goes to the weapon slot. how do i fix this. plz help. you all know what the reward is.if you know how please help 3++rep

item.title: Wrong item place
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

go to item.java and then enter the id for the shield in the

public static int shields

And the dragon hide where it goes

Read full topic
